keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICA AND NEAR EAST AREAS

headline.main: British Battleship Is Reported Hit As Italian Planes Fight Squadron; Rome Declares Other Warships Were Bombed--Also Claims to Have Sunk a Submarine-- R.A.F. Raids African Bases

lead_paragraph: ROME, Aug. 2--An important battle between Italian planes and a large British squadron was fought just south of the Balearics yesterday, according to today's Italian war bulletin. Some of the British units were hit, it is claimed. At the other end of the Mediterranean last night an Italian destroyer ran down and sank the British submarine Oswald, taking prisoner fifty-two members of the Oswald's crew of fifty-five, the communique says.
